item.title: Landing Gear Position Sensors – NOSE GEAR UP SENSORS

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided nose gear door sensors are verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard Nose Landing Gear Light "NLG UP SENSOR INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: For one Nose Gear Up sensor inoperative, verify Nose Gear Door Sensors operate normally as follows:

numlitem.para: Locate Proximity Switch Electronics Unit (PSEU) in main E/E equipment center.
If faults are displayed, verify that they are Nose Gear Up faults only.
Verify GEAR DOORS message (Advisory) is displayed on EICAS after 35 seconds.
Place targets on the following sensors to simulate the main gear doors being closed:
System 1 Right Gear Door Closed S10241.
System 2 Right Gear Door Closed S10072.
System 1 Left Gear Door Closed S10242.
System 2 Left Gear Door Closed S10076.
System 1 Nose Gear Door Closed S10243.
System 2 Nose Gear Door Closed S10081.
Verify that GEAR DOORS EICAS message (Advisory) is not displayed.
Remove the targets from S10243 and S10081 Nose Gear Door Closed sensors.
Verify that GEAR DOORS EICAS message (Advisory) is displayed after 35 seconds.
